attributes.action: give all know shoplifters abso banning them from any town centre in the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I Work in retail and i'm sick and tired of having the same people week in week out shoplifting and being abusive towards my staff and i it would be great if anyone caught stealing from shops in a major city like mine Nottingham could be banned from coming in the city centre

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
